mapper.select: SELECT m.*, SUM(CASE WHEN l.user_ID = #{userID} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS my_like, SUM(CASE WHEN l.movie_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_likes from movie m left join movie_likes l on m.movie_ID = l.movie_ID GROUP BY m.movie_ID order by movie_rank;
